mapper.select: SELECT GENRE_ID AS "genreId" ,GENRE_NAME AS "genreName" ,COMMENT AS "comment" ,CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor" ,CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime" ,UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor" ,UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM ALBUM_GENRE WHERE GENRE_ID = #{genreId}

SELECT GENRE_ID AS "genreId" ,GENRE_NAME AS "genreName" ,COMMENT AS "comment" ,CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor" ,CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime" ,UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor" ,UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM ALBUM_GENRE WHERE GENRE_ID = #{genreId} FOR UPDATE

SELECT GENRE_ID AS "genreId" ,GENRE_NAME AS "genreName" ,COMMENT AS "comment" ,CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor" ,CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime" ,UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor" ,UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM ALBUM_GENRE WHERE 1 = 1 AND GENRE_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{genreId}, '%') AND GENRE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{genreName}, '%') AND COMMENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{comment}, '%') AND CREATE_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{createAuthor}, '%') AND UPDATE_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{updateAuthor}, '%') AND CREATE_DATETIME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{createDatetime}, '%') AND UPDATE_DATETIME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{updateDatetime}, '%') ORDER BY ${theOrderByCondition} GROUP BY ${theGroupByCondition} LIMIT ${theFetchStart}, ${theFetchSize}
